page.description: The {HSCROLL} command displays a horizontal scroll bar.

argument.name: Lower
argument.description: Numeric. The lower limit of the range of values generated by the scroll bar.

argument.name: Upper
argument.description: Numeric. The upper limit of the range of values generated by the scroll bar.

argument.name: Width
argument.description: Numeric. The width of the scroll bar in characters, by default using the size of Arial 8 point characters.

argument.name: Height
argument.description: Numeric. The height of the scroll bar in lines, by default using the size of Arial 8 point characters.

argument.name: Variable_Name
argument.description: Character. The name of the variable set by the scroll bar.

section.title: Example
section.description: This dialog shows a horizontal scroll bar that is 50 characters wide, 1 line high, and sets a variable between 1 and 100.
